name: Judgement Day: Heaven or Hell
description:
It is Judgement Day and here you are. It is your mission and you are in charge of judgement on the reckoning day !

You will decide who is sinner or innocent. They will confess to you what they have done during their lives. Sometimes you will have to interrogate them with the lie detector.

Here they are:

You already know most of them. They are famous people. Politicians, dictators, commanders, emperors, queens, kings, celebrities, intellectuals, musicians, imposters, scientists, movie and cartoon characters.

Some of them are ordinary people with ordinary lives. Doctors, teachers, students, activists, landlords and so on.

Game features:

- Decide whether they go heaven or hell
- Burn one, save one levels
- Choose the most evil one test
- Interrogate them by using the lie detector
- Force them to confess their sins
- It is up to you giving them one last chance
- Swipe right to send righteous souls to heaven and swipe left to send sinners to hell!
- Play various mini games
- Collect coins and use them for characters to confess

Oh my God ! Being the judge of heaven and hell is a hard job ! Secure justice. You’ll be the judge of the spiritual world as you shape the afterlife destiny of the guilty souls.

Play Judgement Day with beautiful graphics with addictive gameplay !
